titleStmt.title: A merie newe ballad intituled the pinnyng of the basket and is to bee songe to the tune of the doune right squire.
Pinnyng of the basket.
titleStmt.author: Rider, T.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henrie Kirkham, and are to be sold at his shop, at the little north doore of Paules, at the signe of the blacke Boye,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "It was my hap of late to heare,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the little north doore of Paules, at the signe of the blacke Boye
